review: I wanted to share with you my experience with Dr Avinash, who I visited today for a check-up. He is a very good person and a professional doctor. He explained everything to me clearly and patiently, and he helped me with my child health issues in a friendly way. I was very impressed by his service and care. I highly recommend him to you if you ever need a doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

We had been visiting him for a year. Everything is fine is what he says. We decided to take a second opinion and found he haven't been advising properly for caring for our kid. Nothing wrong that he advised but important points for our kids care was missing. For first child parents expect some guidance from the doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited him with our child suffering from fever, cold and complaining of ear pain on a Sunday due to unavailability of our regular doctor. The doctor checked the chest, ear and says nothing but viral fever. He wrote 6 medicine's. We returned 4 of them ***** ****** *** **** ** ********** ********** ** * **** After 3 days of continues suffering my child started howling due to ear pain. Fever used to be cyclic and never went off. Being compelled we visited our regular pediatrician and he after thorough checkup mentioned she got severe ear infection and the fever is continuing because of it. ***** ***** *** ******* ******* ******* ******** *** ****** Anyways, long story short that was my last visit to this doctor.
Awesome doctor we. Visited first time and found good the way he treated taken time to understand and his friendly nature hence recommend to visit him

We have consulted 5-6 Visits last 2years for my children. I would like to appreciate, he diagnosed the problem in first consultation. No extra medicine or medical test prescribed. *** **** ****** *** ******** ** **** ****  ***** he is cool person and he explains all relevant information regarding ailment  and he suggested how parents need to act to cure fast for children.
********* ****** **** **** ************* *** ************  We received a good medical attention from all in the hospital.  Very hygienic, helpful reception and everything good .
